ComicInfo.Summary:
From the mind of comic book innovator JONATHAN HICKMAN and pen of super-talent and Image debutant RYAN BODENHEIM comes A RED MASS FOR MARS. In a world that has survived every catastrophe imaginable, a new threat from beyond stars looks to be the end of all humanity.
A RED MASS FOR MARS is a story about the death of utopia, the last days of Earth and the one man who could save us all - but won't.
ComicInfo.Title: Eternity
ComicInfo.Locations: Buckingham Palace,Mars,New York City,Java,Space,Central Java,Olympus Mons
